黑人和白人与睡眠呼吸暂停相关的中风风险可能有所不同根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线期刊 2024 年 3 月 6 日发表的一项研究，黑人和白人与睡眠呼吸暂停相关的中风风险可能有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Stroke-risk-linked-to-sleep-apnea-may-vary-for-Black-people-and-white-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Stroke-risk-linked-to-sleep-apnea-may-vary-for-Black-people-and-white-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccfb7ad7-99bb-4d33-8e1b-530ed4e89e0c Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:13:19 -0500 Stroke risk linked to sleep apnea may vary for Black people and white people
